name: The vial of time
description:
In this smol game you play as an adventurer who wants to obtain a vial of time guarded by giants and magic.

You get to choose 3 rules during gameplay. If you break one of them, a harmful curse will be casted at you.

sorry for lame graphic and no sound, i was really in a hurry.

Wasd, right click for teleport, teleporting on enemy kills them, teleporting on spikes harms you. Left click on enemy to kill.
